籤詩版本二:
Palibe chifukwa chodera nkhawa matenda omwe alipo komanso milandu.
Monga ngati nyani tsopano anamasulidwa unyolo wake ndi kubwerera kuphanga kuyendayenda
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chithunzi cha anyani akumasulidwa kuchokera ku maunyolo ake.
Chilichonse chimakhala chovuta chisanakhale chophweka pambuyo pake.
解曰: Chotsani zinthu. Ndipo khalani omasuka. Bwerani mu nthawi yake. Pezani njira yoyenera.
籤詩故事一:
◇Xiangzi akumana ndi mlendo (Han Xiangzi akumana ndi Lu Dongbin)
Mu Mzera wa Tang, Han Xiangzi anali mdzukulu wa Han Yu. Ali ndi khalidwe lotayirira ndipo sali bwino pakuphunzira, choncho alibe chochitira koma kumwa. Anaitanidwa ndi Han Yu kuti akaphunzire kusukuluko, koma m’malo mophunzira bwino, ankavutitsa anzake a m’kalasi. Pambuyo pake, Han Yu anakonza zoti aphunzire ku nyumba ya amonke, koma abbot wa ku nyumba ya amonkeyo anadandaula kuti anali wodzikuza.
Pambuyo pake, Lu Dongbin anabwera kudzamuunikira, ndipo pomalizira pake anakhala wosakhoza kufa. Wotchedwa Emperor Yaohua. Mmodzi mwa Osakhoza kufa. Chizindikiro chake ndi dengu lamaluwa logwira pamanja.
聖意: Ndilibe mtendere kunyumba, ndikupempherera chuma ndi mwayi, ntchito ikudikirira, ukwati sunathe, Liujia amapempherera oyenda pansi kupita kumunda, mphutsi za silika zachuluka, Liu zoweta zimapezeka, anthu apezeka. , mlandu ndi wolungama, katundu wotayika ali kutali, matenda ndi tsoka, ndipo manda ndi abwino.
古人: Xiangzi akumana ndi mlendo (Han Xiangzi akumana ndi Lu Dongbin)
第X籤: Lotale yopambana ya makumi atatu ndi zisanu ndi chimodzi
